attributes.action: Remove Discrimination to claimants from the DWP Legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The DWP currently discriminates against any person who has the need to apply for certain benefits or grants based soley upon the National Insurance Contributions They have made. If the individual has made few or no contributions they automatically pass the first stage of the decision process whereas anyone who has made contributions does not.
